overview: David Reichman is the CEO & Founder at TripWiser.com a new Online Travel startup. In this role David is responsible for setting the company’s direction and guiding it to success. David is passionate about travel, in all shapes and forms: sailing, boating, road trips, family trips, hiking and most importantly meeting new people and exploring new cultures. David has traveled the world from diving in Belize to RVing in Alaska, crossing the Atlantic and exploring the Gold Country in CA. Prior to starting TripWiser, David served as Vice President of products & General Manager at Mercury Interactive. He holds a BSC degree in Computer Science from Technion University in Haifa, Israel.
